snippet: GOLDMAN--Harriet, 92, loving mom, grandma, and great-grandma, role model, nurse, tennis champ, community advocate, and sunrise swimmer at Quisisana died February 3, 2016 and now is reunited with the love of her life, Dr. Abe Goldman. We miss her greatly. Stefan, Eric, Enid and Doris 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOLDMAN--Harriet, 92, loving mom, grandma, and great-grandma, role model, nurse, tennis champ, community advocate, and sunrise swimmer at Quisisana died February 3, 2016 and now is reunited with the love of her life, Dr. Abe Goldman. We miss her greatly. Stefan, Eric, Enid and Doris 1/3
